titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd on the second of September being the fast for the fire of London, at the cathedral church of St. Paul's, before the right honourable the Lord-Mayor, aldermen, and citizens of London / by W. Sherlock ...
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
